website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for customers wanting a fun backpack design for smaller or larger dogs.
pros: Lightweight pack that's easy to carry for weaker dogs
Interior of bag is padded for pet's comfort
cons: Not the best fit for medium-size dogs

customer_reviews.title: Simply adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size L for my 20 pound-ish Shih Tzu based on the sizing chart. Fits her great, only issue is it slides a little as she walks so we may need to adjust the straps a bit. It also fits a lot of stuff in it, i can put my keys and stuff for my dog in it on hikes. Great little "dog-pack!"
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute and great for the price! My 29 lb corgi fits in the large as long as it is all the way as big as it can be. He doesn’t understand it but loves carrying his treats. It works well as a harness too. We double it with a chain collar just to make sure he won’t escape (learned from experience).
customer_reviews.author: H.Y

customer_reviews.title: It’s adorable, can’t lie
customer_reviews.text: So cute, my chihuahua loves it! Fits her snacks and doggy bags!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Mariscal

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than practical
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely adorable. It's not going to be able to hold a lot but then again, a 9 pound dog shouldn't be carrying a lot of weight anyways. The straps are kind odf difficult to get on how they criss cross underneath. I also find that they aren't proportioned to the belly strap. The leg straps are halfway loosened but the the belly strap is completely tightened and it sags a full 1" down. I'm going to try to figure out how to shorten it, for now it shifts to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pet Bag
customer_reviews.text: Cute Well Made Bag The bag is very well made, durable, and cute! The straps are easy to snap on and I’m able to adjust the straps as needed. The material is soft and has a dog face with ears. It also happens to match my 16lb shichon dog’s fur. I purchased a size Large. I’ve received so many compliments on the bag. It’s plenty big enough for treats and such. He hasn’t tried to shake it off so it’s comfortable on his back.The big plus is being able to attach the leash to a stainless steel ring on the top of the bag. I definitely recommend this bag and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute bookbag, belts didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute. However the belts didn’t fit right. The stomach belt was too big (even tightened all the way) and the belts that went around the arms were snug (on the loosest setting). Dog reference= 5 pound yorkie
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The cutest backpack ever! Not too big or heavy for my pup. Now he can carry his own treats when we go out!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie & Emily

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT SMALL DOGS
customer_reviews.text: my only issue with this is that they list the size as any dog under 22 pounds but do not set a minimum weight. My dog is 5 pounds and it does not fit it's too big so it falls to the side. Kinda a waist of money but hopefull he will grow to fit it because other than that it is cute. There are other bags on amazon for smaller dogs and they fit him fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but DO NOT USE AS A HARNESS
customer_reviews.text: The straps on this backpack are reinforced with hot glue which we didn’t know when we took our puppy on a walk with it. The D ring that was attached flew off the backpack and our puppy ran off with one tug from him. We were just lucky there were no cars around at the time. This backpack is super cute but unless you’re using a separate harness under or on their collar (which defeats the purpose of this harness) I wouldn’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I had to extend the straps to their longest length to get it to fit on her, but once it was on boy did it look adorable! There's a D ring near the top so I can attach a leash to it and the bag itself can fit what it needs. Now my pup can carry her own water bowl and poop bags when we go to the park lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beary  Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo freaking adorable!! So glad I decided to buy this. My little guy is only about 6 lbs so most clothes and harnesses are hard to find a good fit for him. It’s very light weight and fairly comfortable for being a back pack for dogs. 😂 Its big enough to hold keys, poop bags and some treats, but I probably won’t want to put too much weight inside because he won’t want to walk then. If your dog is used to wearing clothes then this should be comfortable. Otherwise, it’s just very cute for pictures or special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Eimi Nagai

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay centered
customer_reviews.text: Super cute backpack BUT it doesn't stay in the middle of his back. If I put anything that had any amount of weight or wasn't a flat shape beyond a couple of poop bags or some small treats, it would flop to one side or another. Had to keep adjusting it during the walk because he was feeling lopsided and awkward. Doesn't matter how tight I adjust the straps, I think it has to do more with the design of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Falconi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My Coco Chanel is so adorable wearing this backpack! She is ready for her doggy training school haha, this backpack is soft, lightweight, and can hold her poo bags and a few small treats. My Coco is 4.2 lbs and this is a size small. Straps are adjustable and do not cause her discomfort. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicci Morlock

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Although an adorable backpack and I love the concept, it came in too small for my dog. I wanted it for her to go to puppy training school as I thought it would be cute for her to have a backpack for school. I ended up trying to modify it by cutting straps from another harness and attaching to this one. It didn't fit right as I could only adjust the one that went around her body and not over her shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Knight Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and functional. Can’t wait to take this on the trails. I wish the manufacturer would make more styles and using different materials. Would love a water repellent one. My shihpoo is about 17 lbs and the large is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kayakblue

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My maltipoo is 17lbs. The backpack fits. It does seem to slide s bit to the side when has item in it. I would expect that from a backpack on a dog though. Works great. My pup doesn't mind wearing it. She gets lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Molly anne

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy but it is cute!
customer_reviews.text: This product came out exactly like it is in the picture. It’s just not sturdy. If you put items that are a bit heavier like wet food etc the backpack will move around. It doesn’t stay on the back, it either shifts to the right or left no matter how much you adjust the straps. I thought it’d be a cute hiking backpack for her to carry her own snacks but it’s not helpful. If you put a small snack and their doggy bags in it it’ll be sturdy but anything heavier than that it’ll move. But overall it’s adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Araya saephan

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size large for my 13 pounds Shihtzu. I can tell you it looks bigger in the photo. What I can fit in the bookbag is a little food plate and some popo bags that's all. If your dog is over 13 pounds I don't think it will fit comfortably. It looks super cute tho.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Harness broke and dog ran away
customer_reviews.text: Super cute product and useful for holding poop bags and collapsible bowl. However, the fabric that holds the metal loop is glued on, so it actually ripped off during a walk. My dog ran away and luckily I was able to call her back. Harnesses should be created with durability as the top priority. Losing my dog is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Pet backpack
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this cute little bear backpack when I came across it😍 I love it! I bought it so I can put my dog’s poop bags & treats inside without me having to just hold onto both by hand lol it’s a very convenient pet backpack. She doesn’t mind having it on her back. I got it in a size Large. My dog weighs at least 22-23lbs. I don’t know if that helps for anyone who needs help getting the right size but I recommend this product for any dog parents who have small dog breeds!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best decision you’ll ever make.
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute cutest freaking backpack I’ve ever seen in my life. I’m a 20 year old male and I can’t believe how much I love this thing on my dog. She absolutely loves it too (Knowing that her treats are stored in it). I’m going to use it to take her hiking so hopefully that works out, but seems like a solid bag. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bryan Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It was too small for my dog so I gave to my sister because she had a smaller dog. It was also to small for her dog.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Useful
customer_reviews.text: My puppy hardly notices this is on! It’s nice for going on hikes and i can pack his water bowl and food in there, other little things to free up space in my bag. And the people walking by love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff Germain

customer_reviews.title: Cute but wonky...
customer_reviews.text: This pupper pack is adorable but it fits a little wonky. We'll still use it to be cute, but as an actual harness, probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reads

customer_reviews.title: TINY!
customer_reviews.text: It is tiny. I have a dog who looks like the dog in the picture and is the same size. The back pack it about 6 inches in diameter. The straps are too small to fit him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok let me first say that this product is 10x cuter than I thought it would be. I was worried at first that it was going to be too small for my dog but the XS fits him perfectly. I wouldn’t trust it to be a harness, but it stretches enough that his harness will fit underneath. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gigi4becca

customer_reviews.title: Cute but faulty
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but no matter what you do it slides to the side. Esp. When anything-(no matter what you place inside) it slides to the side😒
customer_reviews.author: Kristen F.

customer_reviews.title: You want to size up
customer_reviews.text: Whatever your dog measures on their chart, size up by two.
customer_reviews.author: H. Do

customer_reviews.title: Stinking Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! It’s so cute and my puppy baby loves it! Perfect size. Not too heavy or awkward for his little body. He carries his own treats and poop bags inside & it’s so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice bag, great quality. But my dog hates it. It restricts arm movement if it’s not on just right
customer_reviews.author: GreenCowLand

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size small for my 8 pound Yorkie. It fits her big and goes all over the place. I put a sweater under it and it fits better. It’s the cutest backpack she received a lot of compliments and had heads turning . I was surprised with the amount of stuff that fits inside. Perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but won’t stay in right position.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is cute, but it will slide to one side during walks. Tried adjusting it but bag doesn’t seem to stay on my dogs back.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: If you want your dog to look over the top cute and get tons of complements, this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute! But it always goes lop-sided on my dog which makes it.... not cute.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Miracle

customer_reviews.title: It is very cute on my son's 18 pound puppy.
customer_reviews.text: It really is for smaller dogs. I bought the larger size and it fit my son's dog Macaroni, which is a deaf/limited vision rescue pup that ways 18 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Linda Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fit my chubby older chihuahua Geigei perfectly. Now she can carry the money when we go for rides to get food.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Goodno

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag. It looks really cute on my little baby. I also like that it is a harness. A harness on it's own is more than $20. The fact that I can use this as a bag and harness is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It broke the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first time we walked our dog in it. I'm so glad we were in a park and not close to traffic. Otherwise, it fit great and looked really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Caillouet

customer_reviews.title: Cute but incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive leash with it... thought it had one. Cute to put toys and treats in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I would love to keep this bag but sadly it is too small for my pug. Cuteness overload!! I wish the strap was longer.
customer_reviews.author: zd

customer_reviews.title: So many Compliments
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 9lb maltipoo! The material is soft and durable;Thank you
customer_reviews.author: EVG

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: My miniature poodle mix doesn’t like it as much as I do. But it might just be because he isn’t use to it yet. The backpack does mover around. Has enough space to carry house keys and doggie bags and some treats. He weighs about 18 pounds and is a bit chubby and a size L fits pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bichon frise but doesn’t stay on his back, it constantly falls to his side. I’ve tried tightening the straps but it doesn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Diaz

customer_reviews.title: So fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: And our dog, Gizmo, looks so cute when he wears this.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!!! Otis (8lbs) loves it!! Small was a perfect size for him
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable but it’s not durable. My dog pulled on the leash and the clip for the leash pulled right off and he’s only 15 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Zanyell

customer_reviews.title: will fit size 5lb and up.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, when we travel, I pack his snack, a canteen for food and water and a top. It fits🥰
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dao

customer_reviews.title: Works with cats
customer_reviews.text: I order it large because my cat is super big, and he loves the tedy bear backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Good Material
customer_reviews.text: So Fun, I have a 4 months old pug and fits good!!
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Ramirez

product_meta.title: BUYITNOW Cute Pet Backpack Harness Travel Outdoor Hiking Adjustable Leash Saddlebag for Small Dogs
product_meta.description:
Size:Size S

Size Tag:

 * Size S: 5.51" long x 5.12" wide(14 * 13CM), fits for small dogs weight under 22lbs
 * Size L: 6.69" long x 6.30" wide(16 * 16CM), fits for small dogs weight between 22-33lbs



Specifications:

 * Color: brown
 * Functions as both a harness and backpack
 * Zipper closure allows you to easily open and close pet pack
 * Adjustable: allows for you to adjust 3 straps in order to provide a perfect fit for your pet
 * Multi-function: give your dog a job to do with saddle bag, helps to prevent barking, hyperactivity and anxiety so you enjoy stress-free outdoor activity with your pets
 * Attractive bear pattern gives your dog a fashion look, and allows for easy visibility of your dog
 * Washable: hand wash with mild detergent; hang dry



Package:

 * 1Pcs Pet Backpack



Notices:

 * Photo just for reference, color may be different because of the different monitor and light from the photo
 * Size may exist 1inch deviation because of the manual measurement, please consider before purchasing
feature_bullets: ❤High quality soft cotton with padded mesh inner provide a better holding for your beloved pet to ensure your dog will be safe and comfortable
❤Large Capacity - carry food, water bottles, poop bags, toys, first aid, or other daily supplies become more easily, fits up to 2kg weight
❤Fully adjustable chest and side straps allow for a fit that can be customized to suit your pets
❤Feature a sturdy D-ring for easy leash attachment, Perfect for everyday walk, weekend party and service dog use, or just making your pet look its best
❤Size S: 5.51"long x 5.12"wide(14*13CM), fits for small dogs weight under 22lb; Size L: 6.69"long x 6.29"wide(17*16CM), fits for small dogs weight 22lb--33lb

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
